tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE receipts (
    receipt_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    donator_id INT,
    donation_date DATE,
    receipt_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    acknowledgment_sent BOOLEAN,
    FOREIGN KEY (donator_id) REFERENCES donators(donator_id)
);

CREATE TABLE donation (donation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 donor_name VARCHAR(255),
 donation_amount DECIMAL,
 donation_date DATE);

CREATE TABLE receipt (receipt_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 donation_id INT,
 receipt_date DATE,
 total_amount_received DECIMAL,
 FOREIGN KEY (donation_id) REFERENCES donation(donation_id));

CREATE TABLE acknowledgment_letter (letter_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 donation_id INT,
 recipient_name VARCHAR(255),
 ack_date DATE,
 FOREIGN KEY (donation_id) REFERENCES donation(donation_id));

CREATE TABLE donations (
  donation_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  donor_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  donation_amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  donation_date DATE NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE acknowledgments (
  acknowledgment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  donation_id INT NOT NULL,
  acknowledgment_date DATE NOT NULL,
  acknowledgment_message TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (donation_id) REFERENCES donations(donation_id)
)

CREATE TABLE donors (
  donor_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  donor_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  donor_email VARCHAR(100),
  donor_address VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE triggers (
  trigger_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  trigger_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  trigger_event VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  trigger_action TEXT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE procedures (
  procedure_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  procedure_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  procedure_steps TEXT,
  procedure_description TEXT
)
